                                                         V input)
        Parameters:
        next -
        input -
        Returns:
        null if the input point is already in bounds, or the point's rectified position if the point was out of bounds.

      • getClosestPathPoint

      • determineIfInBounds

        public boolean determineIfInBounds(AbstractLimitCone next,
                                   Vec3d<?> input)
        Determines if a ray emanating from the origin to given point in local space lies withing the path from this cone to the next cone. This function relies on an optimization trick for a performance boost, but the trick ruins everything if the input isn't normalized. So it is ABSOLUTELY VITAL that @param input have unit length in order for this function to work correctly.
        Parameters:
        next -
        input -
        Returns:
